entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WER handler is broken #103872
  • Exception on Linux when using the time zone "America/Buenos_Aires" #103864
  • Alignment of `debug_*` sections in ELF #103862
  • InvalidOperationException for nullable int in ConfigurationBinder source generator generated code #103859

Closed

  • Could not load type 'System.Runtime.InteropServices.WindowsRuntime.IActivationFactory' #103870
  • Microsoft.Extensions.HostFactoryResolver project is not building #103553
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix flaky FSW test #103873
    area-System.IO
  • Fix alpine arm64 debug build #103871
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Handle TYP_DOUBLE on arm softFP similarly to TYP_LONG #103869
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize 'x & cns == cns' pattern #103868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Set alignment=1 for ELF debug sections #103867
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Switch `genCall` to new ABI info and unify targets #103866
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add winget command line for prequisite installation #103865
    needs-area-label
  • refactore private DistinctIterator for Distinct of linq #103863
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Clarify XML comments for Utf8Parser.TryParse to reflect case insensitivity #103861
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 126.0.6478.114, windows: 126.0.6478.63 #103858
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Removes the redundant external condition #102883
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Enable nullable for HostFactoryResolver.Tests #103609
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [RISC-V] Add RiscV64 arch to tests/JIT/Stress/ABI/ #103830
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove unused members on Module - crossgen remnants #103848
    area-VM-coreclr

Updated

  • Define JIT format jobs as GitHub Actions instead of AzDO jobs #103846
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make GC stress usable with Libraries tests #103738
    test-enhancement, area-VM-coreclr
  • CI test #99871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Seal overridden virtual method `SetDefaultFallbacks` #100030
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Length guard in ImmutableArray<T>.Builder.RemoveRange #102484
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2480507 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Document the use of non-short-circuiting `|` operator in `Char::IsAsciiLetterOrDigit` #102547
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Set callconv in unicodedata callback and update doc #103852
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix Infinite loop on OdbcDataReader.internalGetString with UTF-8 text #102885
    area-System.Data.Odbc, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • UnixCommandLinePing.cs: improve searching for the system ping binary #103838
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Make DAC return Module instead of PEAssembly for DacpModuleData::PEAssembly #103821
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Implement various other simple vector APIs from 93513 #103837
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Stack allocate unescaped boxes #103361
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Add riscv64 arch to tracing/eventpipe/processinfo tests #103832
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Create new X509CertificateLoader #102167
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Use new ABI representation in `fgMorphMultiregStructArg` #103856
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] collect garbage when memory is low #103857
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [cdac] start of Metadata contract; implement GetMethodTableData SOS method #103444
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Update HWIntrinsicInfo::lookupId to use a binary search #103778
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
